title: BASF 's planned capital expenditure by region 2020 to 2024
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Share of capital expenditure in each Region on the y axis.
The maximum Share of capital expenditure 41.0 is found at Region Asia Pacific and the minimum is found at South America Africa Middle East where Share of capital expenditure is 1.0.
The difference of Share of capital expenditure between the highest and lowest Region is 40.0.
